name: view_insert
trigger_def: CREATE TRIGGER view_insert INSTEAD OF INSERT ON trigger_test.accounts_view FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION trigger_test.view_insert_row()

name: log_update
trigger_def: CREATE TRIGGER log_update AFTER UPDATE ON trigger_test.accounts FOR EACH ROW WHEN (old.* IS DISTINCT FROM new.*) EXECUTE FUNCTION trigger_test.log_account_update()

name: check_update_when_difft_balance
trigger_def: CREATE TRIGGER check_update_when_difft_balance BEFORE UPDATE ON trigger_test.accounts FOR EACH ROW WHEN (old.balance IS DISTINCT FROM new.balance) EXECUTE FUNCTION trigger_test.check_account_update()

name: check_update
trigger_def: CREATE TRIGGER check_update BEFORE UPDATE ON trigger_test.accounts FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION trigger_test.check_account_update()

name: check_balance_update
trigger_def: CREATE TRIGGER check_balance_update BEFORE UPDATE OF balance ON trigger_test.accounts FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION trigger_test.check_account_update()
